japanese:
ドリームセンターって温室だったのね。
名前からは想像できなかったわ。
translation:
I didn't realize the Dream Center was a greenhouse.
I couldn't imagine that from the name.

japanese:
おまけに、外から見たら塔が立ってるって。
あれはどういう意図なの？　謎すぎない？
translation:
Besides, from the outside, it looks like a tower.
What's the intention behind that?
That's way too mysterious, isn't it?

japanese:
あれは塔じゃなくて遠見台らしいが……。
まあ、花は綺麗で見応えがあったよな。
translation:
I heard it's not a tower, but a lookout platform...
Anyway, the flowers were beautiful and worth our time,
right?

japanese: そうね、香りも充分に楽しめたわ。
translation: True, and taking in so many different fragrances was fantastic.

japanese:
それに、あの塔もそうだけど、
建物が色々あって写真映えするところが多かったわね。
translation:
And, besides that tower,
there were many buildings with really picturesque views.

japanese:
ステンドホールも綺麗だったけど、
バオバブの茂っている回廊……。
translation:
The stained-glass hall was beautiful,
but the corridor with the baobab trees...

japanese:
睡蓮の咲く水辺と洋風のあずまやなんて、
日本とは思えないようなシチュエーションよ。
translation:
The waterfront with its blooming water lilies
and Western-style gazebo.
It didn't feel like Japan.

japanese:
確かに。
古代遺跡っぽさがあったよな。
translation:
No doubt.
It had an ancient ruins-like atmosphere.

japanese:
ふふっ！
写真、たくさん撮っちゃった。
少し整理したほうがいいかしら。
translation:
Teehee!
I took a lot of pictures.
I should organize them a little.
Hm?

japanese: おい二乃、ちょっと待て。
translation: Hey, Nino, hold on a sec.

japanese: え？　なに？
translation: Huh? What is it?

japanese: いま、お前のスマホの画面に俺がいなかったか？
translation:
Didn't I just see myself
on the screen of your smartphone just now?

japanese:
ちょっ！？
人のスマホを勝手に見るんじゃないわよ！
translation:
What the—?!
Don't just look at my smartphone without permission!

japanese:
見たんじゃない、たまたま見えただけだ。
つーか、そっちこそ人を勝手に撮るんじゃねぇよ。
translation:
I wasn't looking at it, I just happened to see it.
And hey, aren't you the one
taking pictures of people without their permission?

japanese:
あら、でもよく撮れてるわよ？
変な顔を撮ったわけじゃないんだから、
いいでしょ？
translation:
Well, the pictures turned out great, didn't they?
I didn't take any pictures of a weird face
or anything, so it's fine, right?

japanese: まさか変な顔も撮ってるのか？
translation: You're taking weird face shots too?

japanese: ……さあ？
translation: Whaddya think?

japanese:
撮ってるだろ！
とぼけ方が雑なんだよ！
translation:
You are, aren't you?!
You're not that good at acting dumb!

japanese:
いいじゃない。
私が見るだけで、他の誰にも見せないから。
translation:
So what?
Only I'll look at them,
and I won't show them to anyone else.

japanese:
ダメだ、消せ！
つーかスマホ寄こせ、データ全消去してやる！
translation:
No way, delete them!
Hand me your smartphone, I'll erase all the data!

japanese:
嫌よ、絶対に渡さない。
人のスマホを見ようなんて、プライバシーの侵害よ。
translation:
I will absolutely NOT give you my smartphone.
It's a violation of privacy
to look at someone else's phone.

japanese:
あ、メモリがギリギリ。
この卒業旅行だけでも、かなり写真が増えたし。
translation:
Oh, my memory is almost full.
We've taken a lot of pictures
on this graduation trip alone.

japanese: そんなに俺を撮ってんのか。
translation: Are you taking that many pictures of me?

japanese: だから勝手に撮るなって。
translation: Don't take pictures of people without their consent.

japanese:
なんでよ。
他の誰にも見せないからいいでしょ？
translation:
Why not?
It's okay if I don't show them to anyone else, right?

japanese: そういう問題じゃねぇよ！
translation: That's not the issue here!

japanese:
……恋人の写真を持っておきたいって
気持ちくらい、わかってよ。
translation:
I mean, try to understand
wanting to keep pictures of your significant other.

japanese: えっ？
translation: Huh?

japanese: それは……まあ、わからないこともないが。
translation:
Well... I guess that's something I can understand
to an extent.

japanese: だったらいいわよね？
translation: So it's fine, isn't it?

japanese: だからといって隠し撮りはやめてくれ。
translation: But still, no more secret photos.

japanese:
あ、メモリがギリギリ。
この卒業旅行だけでも、かなり写真が増えたし。
translation:
Oh, my memory is almost full.
We've taken a lot of pictures
on this graduation trip alone.

japanese: そんなに俺を撮ってんのか。
translation: Are you taking that many pictures of me?

japanese:
お前も撮ってやる！
撮られた分だけ撮り返してやるぞ！
translation:
I'm gonna take pictures of you too!
I'll take as many of you as you took of me!

japanese:
いいわよ。
いくらでも撮って、寂しくなったら見てちょうだい。
translation:
I see. Take as many as you want,
and look at them when you feel lonely.

japanese:
はっ！？
いや、そういうつもりで言ったんじゃないが……。
translation:
Huh?!
Well, I didn't really mean it like that, but...

japanese:
じゃあ、二乃は、寂しい時に
俺の写真を見るのか？
translation:
So, when you feel lonely, Nino,
you'll look at my photos?

japanese:
ええ、見るわ。
そして撮った時の風太郎のことを思い出すの。
どんな話をしたかとか。
translation:
Yeah, I will. It'll remind me of the time
I took them, and the conversations we had.

japanese:
だから、風太郎も寂しい時は私の写真を見て、
私のことで心をいっぱいにして。
translation:
Thus, when you too feel lonely,
look at my photos and fill your heart with my love.

japanese:
傍にはいられないけど、
気持ちだけはいつでも風太郎の傍にあるわ。
translation:
I may not be able to be by your side,
but my heart will always be with you, Futaro.

japanese: ……わかった。
translation: I understand.

japanese:
あ、メモリがギリギリ。
この卒業旅行だけでも、かなり写真が増えたし。
translation:
Oh, my memory is almost full.
We've taken a lot of pictures
on this graduation trip alone.

japanese: 俺のか？
translation: Of me?

japanese:
自意識過剰ねぇ。
風太郎だけじゃないわよ、景色とかのこと。
translation:
Aren't WE self-conscious.
The pictures aren't just about you. 
They're about the scenery and stuff.

japanese: うぐ……。
translation: Oogh...

japanese: それに、あの子たちの写真もね。
translation: Including pictures of the others too.

japanese:
……よく考えてみたら、
あの子たちの写真がこんなに増えたのって、
転校してからかもしれないわ。
translation:
Come to think of it,
maybe I started taking more photos of them
after we transferred schools.

japanese: そうなのか？
translation: Is that so?

japanese:
どうしてかしら。
機会がなかったような気がする。
translation:
I wonder why?
I feel like we just didn't have
many opportunities before.

japanese:
やっぱり転校して、風太郎に会ってから……
私たち５人ともが変わったのね。
translation:
I think all five of us have changed...
since we transferred schools and met you, Futaro.

japanese:
もちろん、いい意味でだから。
安心して。
translation:
I mean it in a good way, of course.
Don't worry.

japanese:
別に不安に思ってなんかねぇよ。
俺だって同じだからな。
translation:
I'm not worried about that.
I've changed for the better too.

japanese:
（こいつらに、そして二乃に出会ったことで
　変わった俺自身が、以前よりも
　良いほうを向いていることは間違いない）
translation:
(Meeting the quintuplets, and Nino,
 has definitely made me a better person.)

japanese: そっか、風太郎もよね。
translation: I see. You too, huh, Futaro.

japanese:
出会えて良かったわ。
本当に……。
translation:
I'm really glad to have met you.
Truly...
